application.offer

Class HolidayOffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.offer.Offer
      • application.offer.HolidayOffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HolidayOffer
extends Offer
    Class that stores the data of a holiday offer. It is created from the class Offer
    Author:
    Miguel Arconada (miguel.arconada@estudiante.uam.es) y Alberto Gonzalez (alberto.gonzalezk@estudiante.uam.es)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                    java.lang.String description,
                    House offeredHouse,
                    java.time.LocalDate finishLocalDate)
        Constructor of the class HolidayOffer. It uses the constructor of the superclass Offer
        Parameters:
        startingLocalDate - Starting date of the offer
        price - Price of the offer
        deposit - Deposit to be paid for the offer
        description - Description of the offer
        offeredHouse - House in which the offer takes place
        finishLocalDate - Finishing date of the offer
